item.title: Continents: Gdp per Capita
item.description: ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ purrr 0.2.4 ## ✔ tidyr 0.8.0 ✔ dplyr 0.7.4 ## ✔ readr 1.1.1 ✔ stringr 1.3.0 ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ forcats 0.3.0 ## ── Conflicts ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() gapm <- gapminder gapm_gdpextrema <- gapm %>% group_by(continent, year) %>% filter(gdpPercap == max(gdpPercap) | gdpPercap == min(gdpPercap)) %>% mutate(extrema = factor(case_when(gdpPercap == max(gdpPercap) ~ 'max', gdpPercap == min(gdpPercap) ~ 'min'))) %>% arrange(continent, country, year, gdpPercap) gapm_gdpextrema # A tibble: 120 x 7 # Groups: continent, year [60] country continent year lifeExp pop gdpPercap extrema <fct> <fct> <int> <dbl> <int> <dbl> <fct> 1 Burundi Africa 1962 42.
